snippet.title: Sunshine Secret Book 64 RELEASE - Dan-GPTV's SM64 ROM Hack
snippet.description:
Enter the magical realm of the mysterious Secret Book of Super Mario Sunshine! As Mario arrives, he notices that most of the Shine Power is being usurped, and the Secret Book is in danger... Could Bowser be the cause of this?
Jump, solve and fight your way through 5 unique SM64-style levels, and collect the 40 shines! Each world has been carefully crafted with original missions and polished design in this quality over quantity ROM hack by Dan from GomePlayTV.
This game took 1 year of on-and-off work - 8 months without counting breaks - and about 500 hours to complete.

-----DOWNLOAD-----
PPF patch: http://www.mediafire.com/file/cfq58d6zhy8lpv9/Sunshine_Secret_Book_64_V1.0_-_PPF.zip/file
BPS patch: http://www.mediafire.com/file/13409ck5ai2j56h/Sunshine_Secret_Book_64_V1.0_-_BPS.zip/file

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/dan_gptv
SM64 ROM hack releases from me, both new and old: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRzRbTL5z06lfgDRGWecznGPARS7t2RFi
I stream my game development live on Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/dan_gptv
